mapper.select: SELECT r.review_code, r.product_code, p.product_name, r.member_code, r.review_title, r.review_detail, r.review_photo_original, r.review_photo_thumbnail, r.review_rating, r.review_date, r.review_edit_date FROM review_tbl r LEFT JOIN product_tbl p on r.product_code = p.product_code WHERE member_code = #{ memberCode }

SELECT review_code, pay_detail_code, product_code, member_code, review_title, review_detail, review_photo_original, review_photo_thumbnail, review_rating, review_date, review_edit_date FROM review_tbl WHERE review_code = #{ reviewCode }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_tbl ( pay_detail_code, product_code, member_code, review_title, review_detail, review_photo_original, review_photo_thumbnail, review_rating, review_date ) VALUES ( #{payDetailCode}, #{productCode}, #{memberCode}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewDetail}, #{reviewPhotoOriginal}, #{reviewPhotoThumbnail}, #{reviewRating}, #{reviewDate} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review_tbl WHERE review_code = #{ code }
mapper.update: UPDATE review_tbl SET review_title = #{ reviewTitle }, review_detail = #{ reviewDetail }, review_photo_original = #{ reviewPhotoOriginal }, review_photo_thumbnail = #{ reviewPhotoThumbnail }, review_rating = #{ reviewRating }, review_edit_date = #{ reviewEditDate } WHERE review_code = #{ reviewCode }
